cyclone.name: FLORENCE
cyclone.trajectory: accelerating west-northwest across the southwest Atlantic then turning northwest toward the North/South Carolina coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: coast near Cape Fear, NC–SC border

weather_observation.watch_coast: None in effect (watches likely for NC/SC coast Tuesday)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Southeastern U.S. and Mid-Atlantic shoreline from South Carolina through Virginia–Maryland
weather_observation.wind: Gusty easterly to northeasterly winds could reach 25–35 kt (30–40 mph) Friday–Saturday with a low (≤18%) chance of sustained tropical-storm force
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor tidal departures of 1–2 ft possible in upper Chesapeake Bay, but significant (>3 ft) surge not expected
weather_observation.rainfall: Bands of very heavy rain Friday through Sunday could cause freshwater and urban flooding
weather_observation.other_hazards: River/creek flooding and possible debris flow could disrupt landside transport to the port
